QuestData.Title: Rest in Peace
QuestData.Description: The spirits... the cavedwellers... they howl in agony... $B$BTrapped... in this world... cannot move... to the next.$B$BI... will go mad... listening... to their cries... $B$BPlease...go...put them to rest.
QuestData.RewardText: Thank you... friend. I am... happy... knowing... the spirits... are at peace.
